title: Chanakya Chanakya Song Lyrics Dum
stanzas:
Chanakkya Chanakkya
yedho thandhiram seithaai
un madhiyaal en manadhai
neethan vasiyam seithaai

adam pidithen nee enthan
nenjil idam pidithaai
I love you da

Kadhalukkaaga unthan
nenjai kadan koduthai
I love you da

theeraadha un anbinaal
poraadi enai vendrathaal
en azhagellaam
unakkaaga samarpikkiraen

Chanakkya Chanakkya
yedho thandhiram seithaai
un madhiyaal en manadhai
neethan vasiyam seithaai

Unnai naanum ninaipathai
yaarum thadukindra velai
thudikkum idhayam
velai nirutham seikindradhe
uyir valikkindrathe

nee thandha otrai kaditham
aayiram murai naan padippene
unakkaaga aayiram kaditham
otrai nodiyil ezhudhiduvene

dhinam kaalaiyil
enthan aal kaattiyil
un pinban naan kandu
kan vizhikindren

Chanakkya Chanakkya
yedho thandhiram seithaai
un madhiyaal en manadhai
neethan vasiyam seithaai

Jannalin Â valiye
vennila oliye
kasikindra neram
kattilin melae
kavidhaigal pole
naam vazhalaam
ini naam vazhalaam

idhu polave pala
aasaigale ul nenjil
oayaamal urundoduthe

Chanakkya Chanakkya
yedho thandhiram seithaai
un madhiyaal en manadhai
neethan vasiyam seithaai

adam pidithen nee enthan
nenjil idam pidithaai
I love you da

Kadhalukkaaga unthan
nenjai kadan koduthai
I love you da

theeraadha un anbinaal
poraadi enai vendrathaal
en azhagellaam
unakkaaga samarpikkiraen
